item.title: Powering the BBC micro:bit with a 5V power bank
item.description: I had an interesting question to a blog post I made about running a DC motor from a microbit. The blog post is here. I am pleased that anybody reads my blogs. Doesn’t applying 5V to the microbit board exceed the voltage spec? When we connect the board to our laptops or PCs, we apply 5V to the board through the USB connector. Sometimes I run the board from a USB power bank.
